description: Routine household tasks as commonly expressed in conversation

vacuum the floors and carpets.title: Vacuum Floors and Carpets
vacuum the floors and carpets.description: Clean floors and carpets using a vacuum cleaner

sweep the floors.title: Sweep Floors
sweep the floors.description: Clean hard floor surfaces using a broom

mop the floor surfaces.title: Mop Floors
mop the floor surfaces.description: Clean hard floor surfaces using a mop and cleaning solution

dust the furniture and surfaces.title: Dust Furniture
dust the furniture and surfaces.description: Remove dust from furniture and household surfaces

clean the bathroom toilet.title: Clean Toilet
clean the bathroom toilet.description: Sanitize and clean the bathroom toilet

deep clean the entire house.title: Deep Clean House
deep clean the entire house.description: Thoroughly clean all areas of the house

sanitize high-touch surfaces.title: Sanitize Surfaces
sanitize high-touch surfaces.description: Clean and disinfect frequently touched surfaces

wash dirty clothes.title: Wash Clothes
wash dirty clothes.description: Wash clothing in washing machine or by hand

fold clean clothes.title: Fold Laundry
fold clean clothes.description: Fold clean clothes and prepare for storage

iron wrinkled clothing.title: Iron Clothes
iron wrinkled clothing.description: Remove wrinkles from clothing using an iron

wash bed sheets and linens.title: Wash Bedding
wash bed sheets and linens.description: Launder bed sheets, pillowcases, and other bedding

wash dirty dishes.title: Wash Dishes
wash dirty dishes.description: Clean dirty dishes, utensils, and cookware

prepare meals for the family.title: Cook Meals
prepare meals for the family.description: Prepare and cook food for household members

meal prep for the week.title: Meal Prep
meal prep for the week.description: Prepare portions of meals in advance for the week

clean out expired food.title: Clean Refrigerator
clean out expired food.description: Remove and dispose of expired food items

take out kitchen garbage.title: Take Out Trash
take out kitchen garbage.description: Remove and dispose of kitchen garbage

mow the lawn.title: Mow Lawn
mow the lawn.description: Cut grass in yard using lawn mower

shovel snow from walkways.title: Shovel Snow
shovel snow from walkways.description: Clear snow from walkways and driveway

water plants and garden.title: Water Plants
water plants and garden.description: Provide water to indoor and outdoor plants

feed household pets.title: Feed Pets
feed household pets.description: Provide food and water to household pets

walk the dog.title: Walk Dog
walk the dog.description: Take dog outside for exercise and bathroom needs

clean litter box.title: Clean Litter Box
clean litter box.description: Remove waste and replace litter in cat litter box

change smoke detector batteries.title: Replace Smoke Detector Batteries
change smoke detector batteries.description: Change batteries in smoke and carbon monoxide detectors

priority_scale.1: Very Low - Optional tasks that improve quality of life
priority_scale.2: Low - Regular maintenance tasks that can be delayed
priority_scale.4: High - Essential tasks for health and daily functioning
priority_scale.5: Very High - Critical tasks that affect health and safety
